item.description:
Can a bold display of holiday spirit stop the 12/21 Mayan End of the World?  Let's find out!

For those of you who missed the New Haven SantaCon bar crawl, or who love the idea of Halloween-at-Christmas dancing, come out to SantaDance Friday!

We'll be hanging-out at the Russian Lady, and you must come in bold holiday-themed clothing or costume!

Nothing cancels SantaDance, not even a lack of attendance...I'm going, and NHCer Anna is fully-committed.  Come join us!  Also, it's the birthday for NHCer Christina.

COSTUME IDEAS/PICS: Be a Santa, elf, toy, Christmas caroler, character from a Dickens novel, dreidel, ornament, reindeer, tree, snowman, snowflake, the Grinch, Gingerbread cookie, Hanukah Harry.... Naughty-girl-who-deserves-coal (there were a few at Santacon)...anything!  Just make it Christmas-y. Or just wear red, green, a scarf, and wrap yourself in some garland.  Or an Xmas sweater/sweatshirt.  Or wear a tree skirt.  Stand out!

For costume inspiration, see these photos from various Santacons
http://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.203727084098.127371.708304098&type=1&l=5d7533650d
http://www.meetup.com/New-Haven-Collective/photos/12098852/

ENTERTAINMENT: The highly-regarded live cover band "The Nerds" will be playing in the front room, KC 101.3FM will be DJing in the back room, and there's a fund-raiser that night for Sandy Hook school support.  There will also be a raffle & giveaways.

If people want to meet for dinner before, leave a comment, maybe we'll get something going.

COVER CHARGE: If you arrive before 9pm, no cover charge.  Otherwise $6-10 as the night goes on.  A portion of the cover will be donated to Sandy Hook school support.

HOST: Jason, cell # in RSVP (texting is fine).  I'm tall (6'3"), and I'll be dressed as an elf in red & green, with garish tights

http://www.facebook.com/TheRussianLadyNewHaven

http://www.the-nerds.com/
item.how_to_find_us: Text me. Also, I'm tall (6'3"), and I'll be dressed as an elf in red & green, with garish tights
item.name: Fri 12/21 - SantaDancing at the End of the World, with "The Nerds" & KC 101
